questions.title: My best friend, Connie
questions.content:
My best friend, Connie, is two years older than me. We spend a lot of time together.
Connie has long dark brown hair and her eyes are big and round. People say she is 1． and looks like a doll. When we go out, people often 2． that I am older than her because she is shorter and slimmer（更苗条的）.
Connie is positive（乐观的）even when things go 3． . Last week she got her examination 4． , which were not very good. I thought she was going to be 5． .Instead, she simply decided to do better the next time. Then, every day after class, 6． teachers are free in their offices, she will ask them for help.
Connie gets on well with others. Everyone in my family 7． her, even my younger brother. When you hear her laugh, you will naturally（自然地）laugh 8． . When I feel unhappy, I will talk to Connie and she will make me feel 9． .
I think my 10． with Connie is very valuable, and I hope we will always be best friends.

options.explanation: 根据下文“looks like a doll”可知，Connie长得很漂亮，故选B。
根据“I am older than her because she is shorter and slimmer”可知，人们认为我比她大，故选A。
根据“Connie is positive（乐观的）even when things go”可知，Connie即便事情不顺利也很乐观，故选A。
根据下文“which were not very good”可知，考试结果不尽如人意，故选D。
考试不好，通常会感到难过，故选C。
当老师有空时，她会向他们寻求帮助，表示条件，故选B。
根据“Connie gets on well with others. Everyone in my family”可知，Connie和他人相处融洽，家人都喜欢她，故选B。
当你听到她笑，你也会自然而然地笑，表示“也”，故选D。
当我不开心时，Connie会让我感到开心，故选A。
我与Connie的友谊非常宝贵，故选C。
